statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 4 , -17 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} - 9 \, x - 12 , 2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 3 \, x - 4 , 2 \, x^{3} + 16 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 8 , 5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2}\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
